entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Sioux Lookout
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:01 PM CST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sioux Lookout Airport 12:00 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -0.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -2
Dewpoint: -1.9°C
Wind: S 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of freezing drizzle. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or flurries. Fog patches. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or flurries. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 15 January 2023
